task.title: Renewing Your Library Card
task.shortdesc: All cardholders are eligible to renew their library card as long as they are still residents of Fulton County.

taskbody.prereq:
To renew your library card you will need:
Your expired Fulton County Library Card
An updated proof of residency
All minors must have a parent or guardian present to renew their library card.

step.cmd: Pay off any outstanding fines you have on your account.

info.note: This can be done in person at your home library, or by visiting this page.

step.cmd: Present your expired card and updated proof of residency to the library at the circulation desk
step.stepresult: The librarian at the circulation desk will renew your card, and you will be able to continue utilizing library services immediately.
